_sText:
Surf_Industries
---------------
A linear surf map made by razEr.

Alternate download window: http://www.sendspace.com/file/uufgtp

This map has been in development for a very long time now, and I feel like it is now in such a state that I am willing to release it. I have tried my best to make this as visually pleasing as possible, without making the surf unbearable. 

I hope the surf style in this pleases the surf community, and I did try to differ from my usual surf style, and make it a bit more advanced. 

Map does have a knife-jail in "rebel-resistance" style, where the "prisoners" can escape through a hatch in the middle every 30 seconds, unless the "winner" pushes the release button earlier.

There are MANY secrets through out the map, I won't spoil where they are, but don't bother trying to open blue doors. Yellow doors, MIGHT contain some hidden rooms ;)

Other then that, I feel like this is my best map so far, and I really hope that you ( the community) like it as much as I do.

VIDEO (OLD version)

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/aWakK9xRZnk" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
